TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualizingPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
Public MustInherit Class VirtualizingPanel Inherits Panel
public ref class VirtualizingPanel abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Panel

summary.span: 提供 項目的架構，這些項目會虛擬化其子資料集合。

span.span: Provides a framework for elements that virtualize their child data collection.

summary.span: 這是 abstract 類別。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此情況下，「 虛擬化 」 指的是一種技術用子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量的資料為基礎的項目會顯示在螢幕上的項目產生項目。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 則會耗用記憶體和處理器，以產生大量的大量[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數在指定的時間，可能會在螢幕上的項目。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time. 繼承自一個面板，這類、 計算可見的項目，並搭配從(例如或) 來僅建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目為可見的項目.A panel that inherits from , such as the , calculates visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements for visible items. 下列清單描述的情況下當無法虛擬化項目容器：The following lists describes cases when the cannot virtualize item containers: - 包含不同類型的項目容器。The contains item containers of different types. 例如，可能必須同時使用的項目和做為項目容器的物件。For example, a might have items that use both and objects as the item containers. - 您明確建立的項目容器，來。You explicitly create the item containers to the . 明確與隱含建立的項目容器的相關資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the class. 當是虛擬化項目容器，您可能需要儲存的容器，而不是與資料項目本身相關聯的狀態資訊。When a is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself. 例如，如果項目包含在控制項，狀態會繫結至項目容器，而非本身的資料項目。For example, if an item is contained by an control, the state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself. 當新的項目，目前的值中重複使用用於新的項目。When the is reused for a new item, the current value of is used for the new item. 此外，舊的項目不會不會保留其值。In addition, the old item does not retain its value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用衍生類別中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[virtualizingstackpanel_intro#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the cache before and after the viewport when the is virtualizing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取是不虛擬化項目之高於或低於檢視區的空間量。The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized. 使用快取以避免產生[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目因為它們捲動至檢視。Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view. 屬性會決定所使用的度量單位。The property determines the unit of measurement that is used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板和控制項的物件項目容器上使用這個屬性，來追蹤時的容器可以和無法虛擬化。Panel and Control objects use this property on item containers to track when the container can and cannot be virtualized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsContainerVirtualizableProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly IsContainerVirtualizableProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定表示此 正在虛擬化其子集合的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this is virtualizing its child collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word"虛擬化 」 是指一種技術供子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量資料項目，根據畫面上所顯示的項目產生項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生了許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數的項目可能會在螢幕上的項目可能會影響您的應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 例如，計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(例如或) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可見的項目元素。For example, the calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將繫結至 XML 資料來源，以及虛擬化中顯示的項目使用的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element by using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 請注意，附加的屬性明確設為`true`。Notice that the attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 在此情況下，「 虛擬化 」 指的是一種技術用子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量的資料為基礎的項目會顯示在螢幕上的項目產生項目。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 則會耗用記憶體和處理器，以產生大量的大量[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數在指定的時間，可能會在螢幕上的項目。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.

span.span: Gets or sets how a panel in an virtualizes its child items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會建立每個可見的項目容器，並捨棄它，它不再需要時 （例如，當將項目捲動到檢視之外）。By default, a creates an item container for each visible item and discards it when it is no longer needed (such as when the item is scrolled out of view). 當包含許多項目，建立和捨棄的項目容器的程序可能造成負面影響效能。When an contains a lot of items, the process of creating and discarding item containers can negatively affect performance. 當設定為，則項目容器改為建立一個新的每次重複使用。When is set to , the reuses item containers instead of creating a new one each time. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定; 附加屬性。The following example creates a and sets the attached property to . [!code-xml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下列範例會顯示在上述範例中使用的資料。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]
